isis.stitle: HOOD, GRILLE AND FENDERS - 2000, 4000, 8000 - REMOVE AND INSTALL - 2000 SERIES HOOD SEALS

svcsubproc.title: 2500 and 2600 Model with Original Hood, Cab Cowl Hood Seal - Remove
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 56 for items in parentheses.

step1.para: Release the hood latches on each side of the hood and raise the hood to the full open position.
Remove the hood seal (Item 1) from the cowl flange (Item 2) by pulling it from the cowl flange lip. Save the hood seal for installation, if not damaged.

svcsubproc.title: 2500 and 2600 Model with Original Hood, Cab Cowl Hood Seal - Install
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 56 for items in parentheses.

step1.para: Check the hood seal (Item 1) for cracks and tears, if damaged replace it.
Position the hood seal (Item 1) at the cowl flange (Item 2) and push it into place on the cowl flange lip.
Close the hood and fasten the hood latches.

svcsubproc.title: 2600 Model with Original Hood, Fender Extension Hood Seal - Remove
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 57 for items in parentheses.

figure.caption: Figure 57. 2600 Model Fender Extension Hood Seal (Original Hood)

calloutgroup.callout1: 1. 3/16 INCH BLIND RIVET AND FLAT WASHER

step1.para: Release the hood latches on each side of the hood and raise the hood to the full open position.
Drill out the blind rivets with flat washers (Item 1) and remove the fender extension hood seal (Item 2) from the top edge of the fender extension (Item 3), passenger side shown.
Repeat procedure to remove driver side fender extension hood seal. Save the hood seal for installation, if not damaged.

svcsubproc.title: 2600 Model with Original Hood, Fender Extension Hood Seal - Install
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 57 for items in parentheses.

step1.para: Check the hood seal (Item 2) for cracks and tears, if damaged replace it.
Position the fender extension hood seal (Item 2) on the top edge of the fender extension (Item 3) and install 3/16 inch blind rivets with flat washers (Item 1), passenger side shown.
Repeat procedure to install driver side fender extension hood seal.
Close the hood and fasten the hood latches.

figure.caption: Figure 58. 2600 Model Fender Extension Hood Seal (Aerodynamic Hood After March 1996)

calloutgroup.callout1: 1. 3/16 INCH BLIND RIVET AND FLAT WASHER

step1.para: Release the hood latches on each side of the hood and raise the hood to the full open position.

svcsubproc.title: 2600 Model with Aerodynamic Hood After March 1996, Fender Extension Hood Seal - Install
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 58 for items in parentheses.

step1.para: Check the hood seal (Item 2) for cracks and tears, if damaged replace it.
